metadata.title: CVE-2024-47682 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: sd: Fix off-by-one error in sd_read_block_characteristics()Ff the device returns page 0xb1 with length 8 (happens with qemu v2.x, forexample), sd_read_block_characteristics() may attempt an out-of-boundsmemory access when accessing the zoned field at offset 8.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
